channel.title: The Trade
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Trade"

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded: think its like any special mission once you get what you need you can continue

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
I only have to bingo the leader the same day I try the special mission, right? Not after accepting the mission hopefully? I really don't want to risk wasting 5 more apples.

[edit] Dang, bingo'd 3 people, but they were all already bingo'd and I don't have enough stamina to keep trying.

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded: Goddammit. I tried to bingo Badger, failed, and was bingo'd myself.

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
Twilight Village as of the time of this posting, Badger's free. No promises this will last. (I'm out of apples too).

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded: He was already bingo'd. The message that says you received half points means they were already bingo'd. Too recently is 36 hours from when they were last bingo'd (unless they have Red Water).

item.title: Re: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
What the heck?

I just bingo'd spike03585, the leader of Gladiator village, but when I tried to continue The Trade special mission, I failed it!

spike wasn't already bingo'd either. It said I received half style points because someone else had bingo'd him too recently though. Apparently that's not allowed? What the heck is the time limit on "too recently"? How the heck am I supposed to find a village leader that hasn't been bingo'd recently? They tend to be big targets.

Hmmmâ€¦ I didn't use a notepage to do it. Do I have to use a notepage for the bingo to count?

item.title: The Trade
item.content:encoded:
I need to bingo a non-bingo'd village leader to complete this mission. I was wondering if anyone that already has the trade reads this - if you happen to use it to check the bingo status of a village, could you let me know if you find a leader that isn't bingo'd? Thanks in advance.

Or if you are a village leader, and are willing to let me bingo you, I'd be very grateful.
